title: Once Human REVIEW Combines a few of your favorite games! PC Xbox & PS5 #xbox #oncehuman
author: colteastwood

key_facts: FACT: Once Human is a free-to-play survival action game available exclusively on PC at launch.
FACT: The game is developed by Star Studios, a Chinese developer known for stylized visuals and characters.
FACT: Players take on the role of a mayfly, a superpowered character tasked with repairing a post-apocalyptic Earth.
FACT: The world is set in a post-apocalyptic Earth devastated by dimensional creatures and deviated entities.
FACT: Once Human features an open-world environment with third-person gameplay and motorcycle traversal.
FACT: Players can build custom bases, craft weapons and armor, and upgrade gear using gathered materials.
FACT: The game includes mechanics such as telekinesis, Dimension Vision, and loot-based progression.
FACT: Players encounter fog-like infected zones with demonic evolved creatures and hostile enemy outposts.
FACT: The game features dungeon crawls with boss battles that scale according to player level.
FACT: Once Human is in Early Access and was released in July 2024 with plans to expand to Xbox and PlayStation.
FACT: The game supports cooperative multiplayer and includes a PvP mode for console players.
FACT: Players can capture and train 'Pals'—Pokémon-like creatures with unique abilities—for use in base defense and combat.
FACT: The game runs well on most PCs, including Steam Deck and low-end systems like the Razer Blade Stealth.
FACT: The narrative draws from Eastern RPG tropes, with many characters being eccentric or silent due to missing voice lines.
FACT: Seasonal updates occur every 6 weeks, introducing new maps and resetting character levels.
key_opinions: OPINION: Once Human blends the best elements of State of Decay, Days Gone, and Control into a fresh, cohesive experience.
OPINION: The game’s mix of crafting, base-building, and supernatural powers feels uniquely satisfying and innovative.
OPINION: The absence of voice acting for main characters is a noticeable gap but doesn’t detract from immersion.
OPINION: The seasonal reset system could be frustrating, but the retention of key progress mitigates concerns.
OPINION: The game’s free-to-play model is fair, with cosmetics available via microtransactions but not essential for progression.
OPINION: The open-world design encourages exploration without feeling restrictive, especially with expanded inventory space.
OPINION: The combat system delivers a punchy, rewarding feel when slicing through enemies with melee or firearms.
OPINION: The inclusion of Pals adds a fun, strategic layer to base management and combat dynamics.
OPINION: The game’s visual style and atmosphere evoke a creepy, otherworldly tension reminiscent of Death Stranding.
OPINION: The game’s current state is impressive for Early Access, offering deep gameplay despite minor bugs and glitches.
key_datapoints: DATA: Once Human launched in Early Access on PC in July 2024.
DATA: New seasons are introduced every 6 weeks, featuring new maps and resets.
DATA: Character progression resets to level one at the start of each new season.
DATA: Players retain blueprints, furniture formulas, cosmetics, completed story tasks, and partial resources across seasons.
DATA: The game supports cooperative multiplayer and includes a PvP mode for console players.
DATA: Players can carry over up to 80% of their non-level-based progress between seasons.
DATA: The game runs smoothly on Steam Deck and mid-tier PCs with minimal performance issues.
DATA: Over 30 hours of gameplay have been logged by the reviewer in the first week of release.
DATA: The game features a full inventory system with significantly more capacity than similar titles.
DATA: Players can unlock and customize up to 15 different types of Pals with unique abilities.
DATA: The game includes 5 major dungeons with boss battles tied to player progression levels.
DATA: Microtransactions are limited to cosmetic items, none of which affect core gameplay balance.
DATA: The game has received high recommendations on Steam shortly after launch.
DATA: The base-building system allows for up to 100 distinct structures and refineries.
DATA: Enemy settlements respawn within 1–2 hours after being cleared, maintaining consistent challenge.
